title: saraamroni
author: saraamroni
content: What is best Gem blockchain projects with high potential x30 List !!share with us your list !!  Thank you

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Have you heard about Citizen Conflict?Feel free to check: https://citizenconflict.com/ still not being listed on exchange, however they make a good progress product not just a project for selling a token. Build with Unreal Engine 5 and the game is look dope.Worth to be watch.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Check IDENA. Its first proof of person blockchain. Each person is 1 node with equal voting power. Sybil resistance is achived by Turing test that is being done simultaneous for whole network once each epoch.Very uniqe project with super low marketcap (~~1 M $). So it can even go 1000x. But DYOR. Its much more possible it will go to 0 but risk/reward is worth the try. At least its worth the research.

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: Check Mina Protocol mate, this project is the world lightest blockchain so far, the whole blockchain size is just 22KB, unlike other blockchain that has over 200GB in size, the team are pretty active in the development and the current price is 0.55$, it is possible to see this project on top 10 someday.The second project I like is Aleph Zero, many hate this project for unknown reasons but I don't see anything wrong with the project, I'm guessing it's because of the private smart contract, if you are looking for new projects with active team these two will do just fine. Don't forget to do your homework before investing.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Quote from: saraamroni on November 18, 2022, 02:57:54 PMWhat is best Gem blockchain projects with high potential x30 List !!share with us your list !!  Thank you  I think that you can try to check PYR mate. I think the there are other projects that potentially to did 30x just like MVX and that's having same idea like GMX. these days there are so many problems happened with cex. The decentralized futures trade will become a good solution. Invested at $1 and it goes to the $4, MVX potentially to go to the same like GMX which was traded around $30. The market cap is so small at this moment. Do your own research
